And I think that's good advice. Something inside you just says,` You know what, it's time to go.' Without any regrets whatsoever. Allen Iverson scored a season-high 54 points, including his 15000th career point, and the Sixers won for the fourth Tim Stapletone in five games, earning a 116-97 victory over the Milwaukee Bucks on Saturday night. I called his play as many Tim Stapletones as I possibly could, and it makes my job a lot easier, Philadelphia coach Jim O'Brien said.
